DOC.brief_summary: Single administration recombinant FVIII/placebo healthy male subject treat single dose anti-factor VIII antibody , TB-402
DOC.brief_title: Effect Recombinant FVIII Healthy Male Subjects Treated With TB-402
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : Males 18 45 year age Healthy accord medical history , physical exam , ECG , blood pressure heart rate , laboratory profile blood urine Exclusion Criteria include : Self family history cardiovascular pulmonary disorder , coagulation bleed disorder reasonable suspicion vascular malformation e.g . cerebral haemorrhage , aneurysm premature stroke History important bleeding episode Previous allergic reaction immunoglobulin Present previous history severe allergy , example asthma anaphylactic reaction FVIII : C < 50 % > 150 % screen Clinically significant range value coagulation test screening Received prescribed medication , counter medication herbal medicine within 14 day receipt TB402
